short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Practice mindfulness throughout the day. Return to present moment. Stay Focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mindfulness App helps you to stay focused throughout the day. 

By default it plays a mindful sound in every 5 minutes. Why 5 minutes? Because it is the perfect period to understand the perception of time. 

You can also customize it to suit your needs. Click on ‘Customize Me’ link below Start/Stop button to set your preferred time, volume and sound. You can select the sound that you like from the available 4 sound types. All sounds are inspired by Zen and Meditation practices.
